memberdef.argsstring: (const char *seq, const char *structure, const char *file, vrna_md_t *md_p)
memberdef.name: vrna_file_PS_rnaplot

briefdescription.para: Produce a secondary structure graph in PostScript and write it to 'filename'.

detaileddescription.para: Note that this function has changed from previous versions and now expects the structure to be plotted in dot-bracket notation as an argument. It does not make use of the global base_pair array anymore.

parameterdescription.para: The RNA sequence
The secondary structure in dot-bracket notation
The filename of the postscript output
Model parameters used to generate a commandline option string in the output (Maybe NULL)

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *seq, const char *structure, const char *file, const char *pre, const char *post, vrna_md_t *md_p)
memberdef.name: vrna_file_PS_rnaplot_a

briefdescription.para: Produce a secondary structure graph in PostScript including additional annotation macros and write it to 'filename'.

detaileddescription.para: Same as vrna_file_PS_rnaplot() but adds extra PostScript macros for various annotations (see generated PS code). The 'pre' and 'post' variables contain PostScript code that is verbatim copied in the resulting PS file just before and after the structure plot. If both arguments ('pre' and 'post') are NULL, no additional macros will be printed into the PostScript.

parameterdescription.para: The RNA sequence
The secondary structure in dot-bracket notation
The filename of the postscript output
PostScript code to appear before the secondary structure plot
PostScript code to appear after the secondary structure plot
Model parameters used to generate a commandline option string in the output (Maybe NULL)

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *seq, const char *structure, const char *ssfile, const char *pre, const char *post, vrna_md_t *md_p, vrna_plot_layout_t *layout)
memberdef.name: vrna_file_PS_rnaplot_layout

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *string, const char *structure, const char *ssfile, int *relative_access, const char *seqs[])
memberdef.name: PS_rna_plot_snoop_a

briefdescription.para: Produce a secondary structure graph in Graph Meta Language (gml) and write it to a file.

detaileddescription.para: If 'option' is an uppercase letter the RNA sequence is used to label nodes, if 'option' equals 'X' or 'x' the resulting file will coordinates for an initial layout of the graph.

parameterdescription.para: The RNA sequence
The secondary structure in dot-bracket notation
The filename of the gml output
The option flag

briefdescription.para: Produce a secondary structure graph in SStructView format.

parameterdescription.para: The RNA sequence
The secondary structure in dot-bracket notation
The filename of the ssv output

briefdescription.para: Produce a secondary structure plot in SVG format and write it to a file.

parameterdescription.para: The RNA sequence
The secondary structure in dot-bracket notation
The filename of the svg output

briefdescription.para: Produce a secondary structure plot for further editing in XRNA.

parameterdescription.para: The RNA sequence
The secondary structure in dot-bracket notation
The filename of the xrna output

briefdescription.para: Produce a secondary structure graph in PostScript and write it to 'filename'.
Produce a secondary structure graph in PostScript including additional annotation macros and write it to 'filename'.
Produce a secondary structure graph in PostScript including additional annotation macros and write it to 'filename' (detect and draw g-quadruplexes)
Various functions for plotting RNA secondary structures.
